actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Pinnacles National Monument in California as wilderness.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that each person held in slavery from the founding of the Republic to the ratification of the fourteenth amendment shall be considered to have been a citizen of the United States. Designates specified lands comprising approximately 13,000 acres in the Pinnacles National Monument in California as wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Pinnacles National Monument in California as wilderness.
